section.name: Hudson
section.p: Bruno Bonfils has set up a Hudson [1] server for continous integration of EJBCA.

The hudson for ejbca is available here [2], it keep the 10th latests build, so you're able to see the CVS logs, the result of junit tests, and so more. The result of the build is available here [3], with the following superadmin.p12 [4] certificate (the password is ejbca).
